DOC.brief_summary: Tracheal cuff overinflation know reduce tracheal mucosal blood flow increase tracheal morbidity . Transesophageal echocardiography ( TEE ) probe insertion may increase tracheal cuff pressure . The aim study evaluate effect TEE probe insertion tracheal cuff pressure compare effect single-lumen tube double-lumen tube .
